Hello,

My iPhone 13 is having the following issue:

I bought an iPhone 13 with a state of 'Perfect condition' and it arrived with a screen protector already installed, which hid a small crack on the screen in the top right corner.

I can't return it because I've already returned my old phone, so if I return this one, I won't have any phone left.

Taking a picture seems complicated too since I only have one phone, and these are images taken from a webcam. The crack is barely visible but very noticeable to the naked eye.

Thank you for your help,

Hi ecomobile,

The customer contacted us to inform us that he had purchased an iphone 13 with the condition "Perfect condition" and arrived with a screen protector already installed, which concealed a small crack on the top right of the screen.

Please help us with this customer complaint.

All the best,

Santhas Back Market customer Care

Dear Backcare, 

Please inform the following message to the customer that we are so sorry that they are unhappy with our product. Rather than sending a return, would the customer consider a 40 euros commercial gesture instead? The customer can save the harmful carbon dioxide emissions generated by logistics carriers in facilitating a return of a device which is perfectly functional and fit to use for many years ahead. Kindly inform me whether the customer accepts this commercial gesture. Thank you.

Regards,
CH

Hi ecomobile,

The customer accepts the commercial gesture of 40 euros.

Please take the necessary steps within 24 hours to ensure that the customer is not kept waiting any longer.

Counting on your cooperation.

Sincerely,

Santhas Back Market customer Care

Dear Backcare,

I have given the customer 40 euros as a commercial gesture. Thank you.

Regards,
CH
